product_name: Stonewear Designs Olympia Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The perfect top for active women, the Olympia Tank Top from Stonewear Designs offers a supportive built-in bra and plenty of stretch to take you from crag to cafe in comfort and style. Cotton/spandex jersey is breathable and stretchy. Supportive built-in bra has moisture-wicking fabric and 1 in. elastic support band. Wide strap coverage; stylish crossover front V-neck. Stonewear Designs Olympia Tank Top features slimming contoured seams front and back. Closeout.
short_description: The perfect top for active women, the Olympia Tank Top from Stonewear Designs offers a supportive built-in bra and plenty of stretch to take you from crag to cafe in comfort and style.
